name: Thermo Puzzle
description:
Summary

Thermo Puzzle is a game about thermal conduction.

How to play

Try to warm or cool the water containers to the designated temperature to reach the next level.

Throwing ice cubes into the water cools it down. Fire can be used to heat water up.

Engine

Unity 2018.2.12f1

Assets used
  • Amplify Shader Editor
  • Toon FX
  • Icons from icons8.com
